ai-thag1.1:1.0.1_0: their sources go on their source
ai-thag1.1:1.0.2_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-thag1.1:1.1_0: Like the lions of mighty fang
ai-thag1.1:1.3_0: hear now from those who’ve practiced well
ai-thag1.1:2.1_0: What their name, and what their clan,
ai-thag1.1:2.2_0: and how they lived by the teaching;
ai-thag1.1:2.3_0: how dedicated were those wise ones,
ai-thag1.1:3.4_0: they spoke about it in these words.
ai-thag1.1:4.1_0: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind:
ai-thag1.1:4.2_0: so rain, sky, if you wish!
ai-thag1.1:4.3_0: My mind is serene and freed,
ai-thag1.1:4.4_0: I practice wholeheartedly: so rain, sky!
ai-thag1.1:4.5_0: That is how this verse was recited by the senior venerable Subhūti.
